messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Stealing will be punished by hand REMOVAL. Allahu akbar

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The bartender doesn't know how to make drinks, EVERYONE LAUGH AT HIS SUFFERING. (Im kidding)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Honkmother Base in Space 522, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Say amen if you love jesus.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm the captain, i want my asshole stretched

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Honkmother Base in Space 522 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering SMES.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Service Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Various strange chemical reagents are in one of you, A level 5 biohazard, But it's different, It's sexier and more complex, It still hasn't popped, Go find out who the one with the disease is.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Honkmother Base in Space 522. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Quiet Riot. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please bring a multitool to bridge
